author: newsr.in
title: This week in Germany’s tech scene: 7 stories you missed
text: Watching Germany’s tech and startup industry? Here are 7 stories you shouldn’t miss. Cisco opens innovation center in Berlin It’s the 9th of its kind worldwide: Cisco invests $30 million in a new innovation hub in Germany’s capital. The openBerlin has space for startups, Cisco clients and staff, and offers conference rooms, quiet workspace and creative […] »
